chara.textHome: My name is Nagisa Momoe!
You want me to know more about me?
Okay, here's what I want you to know...
I LOVE cheese! Cheese!

Of course I love eating it,
but I also love how it looks.
It can be nice and round or blocky.....
Just looking at it gets me super excited!

I chose to play trumpet in the school band,
but I couldn't get any sound out of it at first.

No matter how hard I tried,
it would just make a "fwoosh" sound.
One day, I made a discovery!

I could get a sound out of my trumpet if
I shaped my mouth like when I eat cheese!

It's true! See?
I play it like this!
Hmm hmm...
My magic appears to be stronger now!
I feel so refreshed...and also hungry!

I started to love cheese when I first ate
a cheesecake my mom made.
It was sooo delicious...

My mom only made cheesecake
that one time.

After that she got sick,
and had to stay in the hospital.
She's no longer with us.

I'll never get to taste that
cheesecake again...
Oh, there you are!

I was getting so tired waiting,
plus now I'm starving...

Okay then, let's go together!
And, let's eat cheese!
*Nom* Zzz... *Nom*

Time to eat some...hm?
Was that all...a dream?

I was just about to eat that
super rare cheese!
I better go back to sleep!

My favorite lunch is Napolitan pasta,
with ground cheese on top!

You can't have Napolitan pasta
without ground cheese!
*Nom* Hmm...
This one's not bad.
Wait, what? Oh! Um...
I'm Nagisa Momoe!
Want to know what I was eating?
*Giggle*
It's cheese, of course!

When I hear the band practice in the
evening at school, I get this feeling inside...
I start feeling kind of sad, or like, I miss it.

I don't stay up too late because
I'm still kinda young!
So, this here? This is sleep-talking!
See? Zzz...
Are you feeling tired from work or school?

Are you lacking energy?
Down in the dumps?

Well, I know just what you need.
That's right, it's chee—
Hey! Let me finish!
We're fighting Witches.

But that's all because of when
I was spreading around curses...
Ugh!
Why did it have to be like this?!

Endless Mirrors...
This place made of mirrors is definitely
a unique Kamihama phenomenon.
I have to take notes!

What? You want to know what
my favorite cheesecake is?
Well, if I had to choose...
It's baked cheesecake!
They taste good made soft, or moist...
Actually, they taste great every way!

Pecorino is a cheese that
doesn't just taste good,
it's even got a cute name to boot!
It's so...pecorino!
The sound of it just makes me smile!

Something I'm addicted to watching
right now is...that moment when
raclette cheese starts to melt!
I can just watch it forever.
"Nagisa" means "the shore".

My mom once told me, 
"Someday I'll take you to the beach..."

I used to like reading sad stories.
When I read them, I would feel a little,
only a little, comforted.

It has to be me...
I have to be the one to fight that Witch.
It's my responsibility!

The reason this Kamihama City is
different from any other world's?
It's my duty to find out!

That's why I need to take my
investigation seriously!
Yes, I really do!

I can become a Witch to fight,
but in Kamihama...
what are they called, Doppels?
How did we end up with these?!
Pa! Pa-Pa-Pa-Pa-Pa-Pa-Pa!
Parmigiano Reggiano!
*Exhale*

It sure feels good to shout
my love for cheese!
Let's get this over with!
We won!
*Sigh*
Good grief...
Now I can take my time eating this cheese!
Great! It's snack time!
Thanks for the food! I ate ALL of it!
Whoa! I appear to be aging nicely!
Please enjoy this perfect flavor profile!
Hey!
Do you want to know more about cheese?
No? Oh, okay...
I joined the school band.
I chose to play trumpet.

It seemed like fun to be all like
"boop-bo boop-bo"!
